title: GIRLS

description.plain:
On “Girls,” The Kid LAROI explores themes of freedom and fun in relationships. The lyrics depict a carefree attitude, encouraging girls to enjoy life, dance, and break free from past relationships. The song underscores a vibe of empowerment and living.

A lyric from the song first surfaced on an Instagram post from Laroi, and snippets of the song were posted by Laroi on May 8th and May 9th respectively. After multiple teases about the song on Laroi’s Instagram profile, it officially released on June 28th.

The lyrics suggest that the song is about Laroi’s current girlfriend Tate McRae, and details the lavish lifestyle that he can offer her as opposed to her ex-boyfriend and hockey player, Cole Sillinger. It is rumoured that Sillinger cheated on McRae, and the song is also interpreted as a “diss track” toward Sillinger.

embed_content: Read “GIRLS” by The Kid LAROI on Genius

On “Girls,” The Kid LAROI explores themes of freedom and fun in relationships. The lyrics depict a carefree attitude, encouraging girls to enjoy life, dance, and break free from past relationships. The song underscores a vibe of empowerment and living.

A lyric from the song first surfaced on an Instagram post from Laroi, and snippets of the song were posted by Laroi on May 8th and May 9th respectively. After multiple teases about the song on Laroi’s Instagram profile, it officially released on June 28th.

The lyrics suggest that the song is about Laroi’s current girlfriend Tate McRae, and details the lavish lifestyle that he can offer her as opposed to her ex-boyfriend and hockey player, Cole Sillinger. It is rumoured that Sillinger cheated on McRae, and the song is also interpreted as a “diss track” toward Sillinger.
